formattedAddress: 16 Beaver St, New York, NY 10004, USA
adrFormatAddress: 16 Beaver St, New York, NY 10004, USA

originalText.text: Elizabeth is as good as it gets.  She teaches so much material in each class, and she does so with warmth, sensitivity, and fun. I’ve never seen a teacher who was able to demand (and get) excellence from students in a kind and relaxed way. She’s the perfect teacher for kids who have just a passing interest in ballet as well as a serious student with professional ambition. My son and daughter love ballet class and the world of dance and music Elizabeth has opened up.

originalText.text: This is our second year with NAYB and my three girls LOVE it! Miss Elizabeth and Miss Kara are both excellent dancers themselves and teach the children correct training at each level. The opportunities to perform alongside real ballerinas and a full orchestra is such a great, special experience. The school is very intimate and I feel each family is made welcome and a part of right away. I feel blessed to have found this classical ballet school for my children.

originalText.text: The New American Youth Ballet is doing wonderful things for young dancers. The head of the program, Elizabeth Fernandez Flores, is so passionate about art and story-telling through dance and it shows in her students' performances as well as her teaching methods. She cares about her students, and has a big heart and a lot of experience to share.

text.text: The New American Youth Ballet is doing wonderful things for young dancers. originalText.text: I've known Elizabeth for years as her Chiropractor, even before she dreamed of started her Ballet school. I've always admired her passion and love for the ballet and for training young students to be great ballerinas  I highly recommend her school, and as a side note,  I love watching her daughter grow up and perform with her. I highly recommend checking out her cable  series, Adventures of My Ballerina and Me.

originalText.text: We started attending this school last semester and couldn't be happier with it!  Through song, the school has taught the proper french terms for many ballet positions and steps. Not only did it introduce my child to a love of ballet, but each class also incorporates good manners and etiquette. There are professional and knowledgeable teachers. It's an all around fantastic school.  Highly recommend!!
